name: Shin Koihime Musou: Otome Taisen * Sangokushi Engi
name_original: Shin Koihime Musou: Otome Taisen * Sangokushi Engi
description:
Shin Koihime Musou: Otome Taisen * Sangokushi Engi is an arcade-fighting game developed by BaseSon. It was originally released in 2013. It was published by Views.
You can play Shin Koihime Musou: Otome Taisen * Sangokushi Engi on PlayStation 3 and PC.
